name: The Bezos Space Race
description:
Embark on a Complex journey to get to space as the Legendary Jeffrey Bezos!

  • Feel Immersed as you take the role of Bezos himself
  • Start from Nothing, making only a mere $1000 per click
  • Face the hardships of having to count the 0's on your Bank account 
  • Prove that you can get to space anyway!

Made in an Hour for 1 Hour Game Jam 327:
 https://onehourgamejam.com/?page=jam&jam=327
